org.xflatdb.xflat.util

Class XPathExpressionEqualityMatcher<U>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hamcrest.BaseMatcher<T>
      • org.hamcrest.TypeSafeMatcher<org.jdom2.xpath.XPathExpression<U>>
        • org.xflatdb.xflat.util.XPathExpressionEqualityMatcher<U>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.hamcrest.Matcher<org.jdom2.xpath.XPathExpression<U>>, org.hamcrest.SelfDescribing

    public class XPathExpressionEqualityMatcher<U>
extends org.hamcrest.TypeSafeMatcher<org.jdom2.xpath.XPathExpression<U>>
    Implements a Hamcrest Matcher for XPathExpression objects that is namespace-aware and can translate namespace prefixes.

    According to this matcher, in the following example the two XPath expressions are equal:

    a:abc xmlns:a = "http://www.example.com"
    b:abc xmlns:b = "http://www.example.com"

      XPathExpressionEqualityMatcher(org.jdom2.xpath.XPathExpression<U> toMatch)
      Creates a new XPathExpressionEqualityMatcher whose TypeSafeMatcher.matches(java.lang.Object) method will return true iff the given XPathExpression is equal to the one provided here.
